text:
I wanted to be an event project manager. I choos this futur profession because, i like to go to music event and see all the organisation around that. I like the way that the professional of event think about all the point of the organisation, promot the event, call the different organisation for the smooth running of the event.
However, on this job, we can have the opportunity to make a lot of travel and it can be a good things for the cultur and to discover different country.
I think this job can offer to me a lot of opportunity because we have to meet a lot of people and talk with here, so we learn new things on a lot of subject every days. For me, it's verry important to move in a job and see different aspect of the profession to be blooming.
After my 3 years of school on university, i would like to integrate a specific school of event project manager for 2 years and maybe start to practice.
At first i wanted to be professor on elementary school, but i was really lost on all of work the world can propose to us today. So i make a lot of stage on different sector and after my last stage on a association of event, i decided to make some reserche about the sector of event. I finally find the job of event project manager.
